scripts.pre:dev: rm -rf dist/dev .cache/* && mkdir dist/dev && ln -s /usr/src/app/dist/ dist/dev/dist
scripts.dev: npm run dev-server & npm run dev-app
scripts.dev-app: npm run pre:dev && parcel src/app.html --hmr-port 1235 --host 0.0.0.0 --out-file index.html --out-dir dist/dev --global MadamsEditor
scripts.build: npm run build-app && npm run build-server
scripts.build-app: rm -rf dist/index.* dist/app.* && parcel build src/app.html --out-file index.html --public-url ./ --global MadamsEditor
